trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around February 4th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: I was driving north on a main road at around 2am, there was no one else on the road in sight. I noticed but didn t take note of a round white light in my rear view mirror. It didnt move, didnt get bigger or smaller, so i assumed it was the moon. It followed me for about 10-15 minutes. When i finally had to stop at a light, I stretched my neck and looked up to see the full moon through my sun roof. I looked back at the rear view mirror instantly and the light was gone. I dont know what it was, but it was not a car or any type of street light because it was with me for so long.
